definitions.text: (linguistics) the form of a word after all affixes are removed
examples: thematic vowels are part of the stem

definitions.text: a slender or elongated structure that supports a plant or fungus or a plant part or plant organ
cylinder forming a long narrow part of something
the tube of a tobacco pipe
front part of a vessel or aircraft
examples: he pointed the bow of the boat toward the finish line

definitions.text: a turn made in skiing; the back of one ski is forced outward and the other ski is brought parallel to it
grow out of, have roots in, originate in
examples: The increase in the national debt stems from the last war

definitions.text: stop the flow of a liquid

examples: for automatic natural language processing, the words must be stemmed
